data.title: Fun & Modern Family Minivan
data.meta_description: The new 2025 Honda Odyssey is ready to take on family adventures in style. This large family van with seating for 8 has parent-friendly features galore.
data.text:
Elite shown in Radiant Red Metallic II.*

STYLING

Fresh Looks, Functional Design.

Updated look, same family-friendly features. The exterior design of the Odyssey now features a new front grille, front and rear bumper for a more modern silhouette. Redesigned 18-inch and 19-inch wheels add to the eye-catching style.

Elite shown in Radiant Red Metallic II.* 19-inch alloy wheels standard on Sport-L and above.

STYLING

New Wheel Design

Raise the profile of your Odyssey with a striking new design for the 18-inch and 19-inch alloy wheels that add style and presence from the ground up.

Elite shown in Radiant Red Metallic II.*

STYLING

Rear Window Design

The darkened rear windows wrap around to the back while neatly hiding the track for the sliding doors.

Elite shown in Radiant Red Metallic II.*

STYLING

LED Headlights

LED headlights with auto-on/off functionality help you see more while using less energy, plus there’s no fear of accidentally leaving them on.

Elite shown in Radiant Red Metallic II.*

STYLING

LED Fog Lights

The updated LED fog light design, housed below the turn signal indicators and running lights, helps improve visibility of the road ahead.

Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.

Elite shown in Platinum White Pearl*, Modern Steel Metallic, and Sonic Gray Pearl* with Honda Genuine Accessories. *

ACCESSORIES

Honda Genuine Accessories

With a host of Honda Genuine Accessories like roof rails, the customization possibilities are nearly endless.

Elite shown in Lunar Silver Metallic with Honda Genuine Accessories. Photo has been digitally enhanced to show the light more clearly.

ACCESSORIES

Welcome Light

When you unlock your Odyssey, the welcome light illuminates the ground outside your doors, helping you watch your step when getting in and out.

ACCESSORIES

Chrome Door Trim

The chrome door trim is a stylish accent that adds a finishing touch to your Odyssey. It’s made of high-quality material for long-lasting durability and designed specifically for your Odyssey so the fit and finish are exact.

ACCESSORIES

Roof Rails and Crossbars

Roof rails and crossbars work with your choice of roof attachments to help you securely haul items,* from bikes to skis or a roof box.

ACCESSORIES

Body Side Molding

The contours of the streamlined body side molding look stylish while also helping to protect your Odyssey from door dings.

ACCESSORIES

Chrome Rear Bumper Protector

The chrome rear bumper protector enhances your exterior, while helping prevent scratches when loading and unloading.

STYLING

Fresh Looks, Functional Design.

Updated look, same family-friendly features. The exterior design of the Odyssey now features a new front grille, front and rear bumper for a more modern silhouette. Redesigned 18-inch and 19-inch wheels add to the eye-catching style.

STYLING

LED Fog Lights

The updated LED fog light design, housed below the turn signal indicators and running lights, helps improve visibility of the road ahead.

ACCESSORIES

Honda Genuine Accessories

With a host of Honda Genuine Accessories like roof rails, the customization possibilities are nearly endless.

ACCESSORIES

Welcome Light

When you unlock your Odyssey, the welcome light illuminates the ground outside your doors, helping you watch your step when getting in and out.

ACCESSORIES

Chrome Door Trim

The chrome door trim is a stylish accent that adds a finishing touch to your Odyssey. It’s made of high-quality material for long-lasting durability and designed specifically for your Odyssey so the fit and finish are exact.

ACCESSORIES

Roof Rails and Crossbars

Roof rails and crossbars work with your choice of roof attachments to help you securely haul items,* from bikes to skis or a roof box.

ACCESSORIES

Body Side Molding

The contours of the streamlined body side molding look stylish while also helping to protect your Odyssey from door dings.

ACCESSORIES

Chrome Rear Bumper Protector

The chrome rear bumper protector enhances your exterior, while helping prevent scratches when loading and unloading.

Elite shown with Gray Leather. 2024 model shown.

CABIN

Magic Slide® 2nd-Row Seats

The innovative Magic Slide® 2nd-row seats allow for convenient access to the third row while also making it easier to move the seat within reach of the front row. They can also fold flat, for easy removal and carrying.

CABIN

Seating Configurations

With seating for 8, the Odyssey is spacious and accommodating enough to make even long drives a breeze.

CabinWatch® standard on Touring and Elite. CabinTalk® through headphones standard on Touring. CabinTalk® through headphones and/or speakers standard on Elite.

CABIN

CabinWatch® and CabinTalk®

Keep an eye on your rear passengers, even in the dark, with CabinWatch®. You can also speak to them with CabinTalk®, which lets your voice come through their connected headphones and/or the rear speakers.

Elite shown with Gray Leather. Leather-trimmed interior standard on EX-L and above.

CABIN

Leather-Trimmed Interior

The leather-trimmed interior now comes standard on all trims, providing you and your passengers with a premium experience during every drive.

CABIN

Digital Instrument Cluster

A 7-inch digital instrument cluster displays customizable information, including Honda Sensing® indicators, phone calls, and select app controls.

COMFORT

Heated and Ventilated Seats

Available heated and ventilated perforated front seats keep you and your front passenger comfortable in any weather.

One-touch power moonroof standard on EX-L and above.

COMFORT

One-Touch Power Moonroof

Whether you're off to the beach or exploring the city, get a better view and some fresh air with the one-touch power moonroof.

Elite shown in Modern Steel Metallic.

COMFORT

Remote Engine Start

Remote engine start lets you get the tri-zone automatic climate control running before you step inside, helping you warm up on cold days or cool down when it's hot out.

COMFORT

Tri-Zone Climate Control

The tri-zone automatic climate control system makes it easy to keep everyone comfortable.

Third-row sunshades standard on Touring and Elite.

COMFORT

Sunshades

Provide quick relief from the glaring sun with integrated sunshades for second- and third-row passengers.

Heated, leather-wrapped steering wheel standard on Elite.

COMFORT

Heated Steering Wheel

Treat your hands to the comfort of a luxurious heated, leather-wrapped steering wheel, and enjoy a warmer, more pleasant driving experience.

Elite shown in Sonic Gray Pearl.* Power tailgate with programmable height standard on EX-L and above. Hands-free access power tailgate standard on Elite.

CARGO

Hands-Free Access Power Tailgate

Whether loading or unloading, a simple kick of your foot under the rear bumper will grant you hands-free access to the rear cargo space. The power tailgate's height-adjustable feature makes it quick and easy to customize for drivers of all sizes.

CARGO

Cargo Space

It’s easy to access up to 158 cubic feet* of total cargo space,* with removable 2nd-row seats and a one-motion 60/40 split 3rd-row Magic Seat® that stows directly into the floor. Bag hooks on the back of the Magic Seat help keep groceries upright.

CARGO

Cargo Configurations

With a one-motion 60/40 split 3rd-row Magic Seat® and available Magic Slide® 2nd-row seats, the Odyssey offers plenty of ways to make space for more cargo* while still allowing room for passengers.

ACCESSORIES

All-Season Floor Mats

Wet boots? Muddy shoes? Dog hair? No problem. All-season floor mats* act as a protective layer between nature and your original carpets.

2021 Odyssey shown.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Bins

The cargo bins are designed to be inserted into the well behind the rear seats and are sized to match the width of the 60/40 split seats. Either or both can be removed to stow the corresponding seat.

2021 Odyssey shown.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Mat

The molded vinyl trifold cargo mat helps protect the cargo area from everyday wear and tear.

ACCESSORIES

2nd- and 3rd-Row Seat Covers

The daily wear and tear on your rear seats can be brutal. Seat covers offer stylish protection that will help keep your original seats in excellent condition.

2021 Odyssey shown.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Net

The cargo net helps keep your grocery bags upright and holds most loose items securely in place.*

CABIN

Magic Slide® 2nd-Row Seats

The innovative Magic Slide® 2nd-row seats allow for convenient access to the third row while also making it easier to move the seat within reach of the front row. They can also fold flat, for easy removal and carrying.

CABIN

Seating Configurations

With seating for 8, the Odyssey is spacious and accommodating enough to make even long drives a breeze.

CABIN

CabinWatch® and CabinTalk®

Keep an eye on your rear passengers, even in the dark, with CabinWatch®. You can also speak to them with CabinTalk®, which lets your voice come through their connected headphones and/or the rear speakers.

CABIN

Leather-Trimmed Interior

The leather-trimmed interior now comes standard on all trims, providing you and your passengers with a premium experience during every drive.

CABIN

Digital Instrument Cluster

A 7-inch digital instrument cluster displays customizable information, including Honda Sensing® indicators, phone calls, and select app controls.

COMFORT

Heated and Ventilated Seats

Available heated and ventilated perforated front seats keep you and your front passenger comfortable in any weather.

COMFORT

One-Touch Power Moonroof

Whether you're off to the beach or exploring the city, get a better view and some fresh air with the one-touch power moonroof.

COMFORT

Remote Engine Start

Remote engine start lets you get the tri-zone automatic climate control running before you step inside, helping you warm up on cold days or cool down when it's hot out.

COMFORT

Tri-Zone Climate Control

The tri-zone automatic climate control system makes it easy to keep everyone comfortable.

COMFORT

Sunshades

Provide quick relief from the glaring sun with integrated sunshades for second- and third-row passengers.

COMFORT

Heated Steering Wheel

Treat your hands to the comfort of a luxurious heated, leather-wrapped steering wheel, and enjoy a warmer, more pleasant driving experience.

CARGO

Hands-Free Access Power Tailgate

Whether loading or unloading, a simple kick of your foot under the rear bumper will grant you hands-free access to the rear cargo space. The power tailgate's height-adjustable feature makes it quick and easy to customize for drivers of all sizes.

CARGO

Cargo Space

It’s easy to access up to 158 cubic feet* of total cargo space,* with removable 2nd-row seats and a one-motion 60/40 split 3rd-row Magic Seat® that stows directly into the floor. Bag hooks on the back of the Magic Seat help keep groceries upright.

CARGO

Cargo Configurations

With a one-motion 60/40 split 3rd-row Magic Seat® and available Magic Slide® 2nd-row seats, the Odyssey offers plenty of ways to make space for more cargo* while still allowing room for passengers.

ACCESSORIES

All-Season Floor Mats

Wet boots? Muddy shoes? Dog hair? No problem. All-season floor mats* act as a protective layer between nature and your original carpets.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Bins

The cargo bins are designed to be inserted into the well behind the rear seats and are sized to match the width of the 60/40 split seats. Either or both can be removed to stow the corresponding seat.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Mat

The molded vinyl trifold cargo mat helps protect the cargo area from everyday wear and tear.

ACCESSORIES

2nd- and 3rd-Row Seat Covers

The daily wear and tear on your rear seats can be brutal. Seat covers offer stylish protection that will help keep your original seats in excellent condition.

ACCESSORIES

Cargo Net

The cargo net helps keep your grocery bags upright and holds most loose items securely in place.*

CONNECTIVITY

Wireless Apple CarPlay® Compatibility

Use your iPhone® with wireless Apple CarPlay® to get directions, send or receive messages, and access your music library, all through the touch-screen.*

CONNECTIVITY

Wireless Android Auto™ Compatibility

Use your Android™ phone with wireless Android Auto compatibility to access directions, text messages, and your music library, all through the touch-screen.*

Elite shown in Radiant Red Metallic II.* Wi-Fi® hotspot capability standard on Touring and Elite.

CONNECTIVITY

Wi-Fi® Hotspot Capability

Enjoy available wireless streaming capabilities on your audio and entertainment system by turning your Odyssey into a Wi-Fi® hotspot* with a data plan from AT&T®. Learn more about data plans here.

Honda Satellite-Linked Navigation System™ standard on Touring and Elite.

CONNECTIVITY

Navigation System

The Honda Satellite-Linked Navigation System™* uses offline maps, so you’ll always be able to find your way even in areas without a cell-phone signal. In addition to directions, it also features lane guidance to help you prepare for upcoming turns.

CONNECTIVITY

CabinControl®

Too cold? Too warm? Your passengers can adjust the interior temperature with the CabinControl® app's climate-control feature. And with the social playlist feature, everyone can have a say in the music played by simply adding a song to a playlist.

HondaLink® Subscription Services standard on Touring and Elite. Screen shown may not be current.

CONNECTIVITY

HondaLink®

Check fuel status, start your engine remotely, control the door locks and more, all from your smartphone.* See details here.

Advanced Rear Entertainment System standard on Touring and Elite.

ENTERTAINMENT

Rear Entertainment System

The large 12.8-inch screen makes viewing feel like a home away from home experience with easy viewing for the whole family, music and video streaming.

Elite shown with Gray Interior. Advanced Rear Entertainment System with 12.8-inch High-Resolution Screen standard for Elite and Touring.

ENTERTAINMENT

Bring Your Own Device

Want to watch your family favorites from streaming services like Netflix or Hulu on the road? Simply cast directly from your devices or connect via Bluetooth®* compatible headphones for a fun-filled drive.

Elite shown with Gray Leather. Second-row USB charging ports standard on EX-L and above. Third-row USB charging port standard on Touring and Elite.

ENTERTAINMENT

HDMI and USB Ports

Keep the entire family charged up and entertained with HDMI and USB ports located throughout the cabin. USB ports in the front, center console, and second and third rows let you charge up to five compatible digital devices.

550-watt premium audio system with 11 speakers standard on Elite.

ENTERTAINMENT

Premium Audio

The perfect soundtrack makes every drive that much better. The available 11-speaker premium audio system helps turn pretty much any soundtrack into the perfect one.

Multi-zone audio standard on Elite.

ENTERTAINMENT

Multi-Zone Audio

Multi-zone audio allows you to choose between preset zones, so you can play music in one zone while another remains quiet.

PEACE OF MIND

Blind Spot Information System

BSI* uses radar sensors to detect the presence of vehicles to the side and behind your vehicle, to assist you during lane changes. Warning indicators alert you if the system detects a vehicle.

PEACE OF MIND

Multi-Angle Rearview Camera

Choose from three different angles—normal, top-down, and wide—for a better view of what’s behind you whenever you shift into Reverse.*

Elite shown in Radiant Red Metallic II.*

PEACE OF MIND

Smart Entry

Leave the key in your pocket. With Smart Entry, you can unlock the doors with a touch of the door handle. And with Walk Away Auto Lock®, they’ll automatically lock when you shut them all and then move 8 feet away.

CabinWatch® standard on Touring and Elite.

PEACE OF MIND

Rear Seat Reminder

The Odyssey adds extra peace of mind for parents with the rear seat reminder.* If you open one of the rear doors at the start of your drive, you’ll then get a visual alert after you park and turn off the ignition, reminding you to check for rear-seat passengers.

CONNECTIVITY

Wireless Apple CarPlay® Compatibility

Use your iPhone® with wireless Apple CarPlay® to get directions, send or receive messages, and access your music library, all through the touch-screen.*

CONNECTIVITY

Wireless Android Auto™ Compatibility

Use your Android™ phone with wireless Android Auto compatibility to access directions, text messages, and your music library, all through the touch-screen.*

CONNECTIVITY

Wi-Fi® Hotspot Capability

Enjoy available wireless streaming capabilities on your audio and entertainment system by turning your Odyssey into a Wi-Fi® hotspot* with a data plan from AT&T®. Learn more about data plans here.

CONNECTIVITY

Navigation System

The Honda Satellite-Linked Navigation System™* uses offline maps, so you’ll always be able to find your way even in areas without a cell-phone signal. In addition to directions, it also features lane guidance to help you prepare for upcoming turns.

CONNECTIVITY

CabinControl®

Too cold? Too warm? Your passengers can adjust the interior temperature with the CabinControl® app's climate-control feature. And with the social playlist feature, everyone can have a say in the music played by simply adding a song to a playlist.

CONNECTIVITY

HondaLink®

Check fuel status, start your engine remotely, control the door locks and more, all from your smartphone.* See details here.
